The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka  
ɼ  ලංකා  ȝජාතාǦƵක  සමාජවා Ǐ  ජනරජ ෙɏ  ගැසŸ  පƴ ය 
අƯ ɪෙශෂ   
අංක 2188/10 - 2020 අෙගʤස්Ʊ මස 10 වැǧ සǿදා - 2020.08.10 
 
  No. 2188/10 –  MONDAY, AUGUST 10, 2020 
EXTRAORDINARY 
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk 
(Published by Authority) 
 
PART I : SECTION (I)  —  GENERAL 
 
Government  Notifications 
1A - PG 5089 - 94 (2020/08) 
 
FOREST CONSERVATION ORDINANCE 
  
THE order under section 3. that has to be read with Section 64.(1) of the Forest Conservation Ordina nce (Chapter 451), 
as Act, No. 13 of 1966, as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 
of 2009.that have to be read with section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic 
of Sri Lanka. 
  
The Order 
  
By virtue of powers vested in me by section 3. of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) as amended by Acts, 
No. 13 of 1966, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009, I , 
S.M.Chandrasena, Minister of Environment and Wildlife Resources declare the Thennamaramvadi Mangrove Forest 
of 108.842 hectares bounded by the limit set forth in the schedule hereto as Thennamaramvadi Mangrove Reserved 
Forest from 26 day of 07, 2020. 
  
 S. M. CHANDRASENA, 
 Minister of Environment and Wildlife Resources. 
  
26 day of July 2020, 
Battaramulla, 
Ministry of Environment and Wildlife Resources.

PART  I : Sec (1) – GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIS T REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 10.08.2020 
SCHEDULE

trict in the Eastern province of Sri Lanka located Within the area depicted by the following geodesic coordinates.

3A I ෙකʣටස : (I) ෙඡදය - ɼ ලංකා ȝජාතාǦƵක සමාජවාǏ ජනරජෙɏ අƯ ɪෙශෂ ගැසŸ පƴය - 2020.08.10 
PART  I : Sec (1) – GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIS T REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 10.08.2020 
FOREST CONSERVATION ORDINANCE 
 
THE  order under section 3. that has to be read with Section 64.(1) of the Forest Conservation Ordin ance (Chapter 451), 
as Act, No. 13 of 1966, as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 
of 2009,that have to be read with section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic 
of Sri Lanka. 
 
The Order 
 
By virtue of powers vested in me by section 3. of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) as  amended by 
Acts, No. 13 of 1966, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2 009, I, 
S.M.Chandrasena, Minister of Environment and Wildlife Resources declare the Puvarasanthivu Mangrove                 
Forest of 135.581 hectares and located in the below mentioned schedule 01, 02, 03 and 04 and boundaries as Puvaras-
anthivu Mangrove Reserved Forest from 25 day of July  2020. 
 
 S.M.CHANDRASENA, 
 Minister of Environment and Wildlife Resources. 
 
06 day of July 2020, 
Battaramulla, 
Ministry of Environment and Wildlife Resources.

method – Geodesic coordinates EPSG: 5234 method)

SCHEDULE 02 
 
The state land area of 41.094 ha. Located within Kinniya Divisional Secretary Division of  Trincomalee District in 
the Eastern province of Sri Lanka located Within the area depicted by the following geodesic coordinates (Survey 
method – Geodesic coordinates EPSG : 5234 method)

08-539/2 
 
 
 
 
FOREST CONSERVATION ORDINANCE 
 
THE order under section 3. that has to be read with Section 64.(1) of the Forest Conservation Ordina nce (Chapter 451), 
as Act, No. 13 of 1966, as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 
of 2009.that have to be read with section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic 
of Sri Lanka. 
 
 
The Order 
 
By virtue of powers vested in me by section 3. of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) as  amended by 
Acts, No. 13 of 1966, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2 009, I, 
S.M.Chandrasena, Minister of Environment and Wildlife Resources declare the Sinnakarachchi Mangrove                  
Forest of 110.372 hectares bounded by the limit set forth in the schedule hereto as Sinnakarachchi Mangrove Re-
served Forest from 26  day of July 2020. 
 
 
   S.M.CHANDRASENA, 
 Minister of Environment and Wildlife Resources. 
 
 
26th day of July 2020, 
Battaramulla, 
Ministry of Environment and Wildlife Resources. 
 
 
 
SCHEDULE

the Eastern province of Sri Lanka located within the area depicted by the following geodesic coordinates (Survey  
method – Geodesic coordinates EPSG: 5234 method).

12 A I ෙකʣටස : (I) ෙඡදය - ɼ ලංකා ȝජාතාǦƵක සමාජවාǏ ජනරජෙɏ අƯ ɪෙශෂ ගැසŸ පƴය - 2020.08.10 
PART  I : Sec (1) – GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIS T REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 10.08.2020 
FOREST CONSERVATION ORDINANCE 
 
THE order under section 3. that has to be read with Section 64.(1) of the Forest Conservation Ordina nce (Chapter 451), 
as Act, No. 13 of 1966, as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 
of 2009.that have to be read with section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic 
of Sri Lanka. 
 
The Order 
 
By virtue of powers vested in me by section 3. of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) as amended by Acts, 
No. 13 of 1966, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009, I , 
S.M.Chandrasena, Minister of Environment and Wildlife Resources declare the Salpe Aru 1 Mangrove Forest of 
53.609 hectares bounded by the limit set forth in the schedule hereto as Salpe Aru 1 Mangrove Reserved Forest from 
26day of  07, 2020. 
 
 S.M.CHANDRASENA, 
 Minister of Environment and Wildlife Resources. 
 
26th day of July 2020, 
Battaramulla, 
Ministry of Environment and Wildlife Resources. 
 
 
 
SCHEDULE

13A I ෙකʣටස : (I) ෙඡදය - ɼ ලංකා ȝජාතාǦƵක සමාජවාǏ ජනරජෙɏ අƯ ɪෙශෂ ගැසŸ පƴය - 2020.08.10 
PART  I : Sec (1) – GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIS T REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 10.08.2020 
FOREST CONSERVATION ORDINANCE 
 
THE order under section 3. that has to be read with Section 64.(1) of the Forest Conservation Ordina nce (Chapter 451), 
as Act, No. 13 of 1966, as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 
of 2009.that have to be read with section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic 
of Sri Lanka. 
 
The Order 
 
By virtue of powers vested in me by section 3. of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) as  amended by 
Acts, No. 13 of 1966, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2 009, I, 
S.M.Chandrasena, Minister of Environment and Wildlife Resources declare the Salpe Aru 2 Mangrove Forest of9.762 
hectares bounded by the limit set forth in the schedule hereto as Salpe Aru 2 Mangrove Reserved Forest from 26th  
day of 07 2020. 
 
 S.M.Chandrasena, 
 Minister of Environment and Wildlife Resources. 
 
  
26th day of July 2020, 
Battaramulla, 
Ministry of Environment and Wildlife Resources.
